Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: @PTYX  we're working on building the new website with Ideas By Nature and dPoW will get its fair share of attention. We've considered creating separate sites for things like dPoW or Agama but ultimately decided against it because we don't really have the resources to build and maintain 3 different sites.

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: Plus, the Komodo website's domain authority is pretty strong so it has a much better chance of appearing in search engine results

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: For instance, if you search for "blockchain security service" on Google , Komodo is the #1 result.  If we had a separate site for dPoW, we wouldn't be able to rank that well

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: This has been said many times but I'll cover it again-- it's not just a new logo. It's not just a new website. It's not just a new GUI. It's a full rebrand. We're literally trying to redefine Komodo from the ground up

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: So yes, it takes time. We're going to make sure everything is done properly, rather than getting it done to say we did it
